Description: EVALUATION OF HEPA FILTERS AND OTHER TECHNOLOGIES TO ENHANCE NUCLEAR SAFETY IN THE DEFENSE WASTE COMPLEX

THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY'S ENERGY INFORMATION ADMINISTRATION WILL PROVIDE A FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE GRANT TO SUPPORT THE CONTINUATION OF THE AMERICAN STATISTICAL ASSOCIATION'S (ASA) COMMITTEE ON ENERGY STATISTICS MEETINGS. THE ASA COMMITTEE ON ENERGY STATISTICS WILL CONSIDER ENERGY STATISTICS AS THEY RELATE TO ENERGY POLICY ANALYSIS AND THE FRAMING OF A COMPREHENSIVE ENERGY DATA SYSTEM AND PROMOTE THE INTEGRATION OF ENERGY STATISTICS WITH OTHER STATISTICAL PROGRAMS AND WITH EXISTING BODIES OF NATIONAL STATISTICS. THIS GRANT IS DESIGNED TO UNDERWRITE A SERIES OF 10 SPECIFIED MEETINGS TO BE HELD TWICE YEARLY BETWEEN THE AMERICAN STATISTICAL ASSOCIATION (ASA) COMMITTEE ON ENERGY STATISTICS AND THE ENERGY INFORMATION ADMINISTRATION (EIA).
MEETINGS TO BE HELD TWICE YEARLY BETWEEN THE AMERICAN STATISTICAL ASSOCIATION (ASA) COMMITTEE.
